title: studyShare
description: A collaborative note-sharing platform built with PHP and MySQL. Features user authentication, real-time collaboration, and file attachments.

title: Real-Time Chat App
description: A messaging platform using PHP and WebSockets for real-time communication with user presence indicators.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A responsive developer portfolio to showcase projects, skills with SVG progress, and contact form integration.

title: ToDo List App
description: Simple task manager app built with PHP and MySQL to add, edit, delete, and complete tasks.

title: Responsive Blog UI
description: A mobile-first blog UI layout with dark mode toggle, sticky navbar, and card-based design.

title: Color Hex Generator
description: Web tool that allows users to search color names and get their HEX codes with live preview.
